TextView.android:text: 1 Ow The sound of ow, as in now, is written
2 Word Ending -ther The word ending -ther, as in other, is represented by ith.
3 Word Beginning Con- The word beginning con-, as in confer, is represented by k.
4 Word Beginning Com- The word beginning com-, as in complete, is also represented by k.
5 Con-, Com- Followed by a Vowel When con-,com- are followed by a vowel, these word beginnings are represented by kn or km.
